moves.name: Elemental Master
moves.description: All elemental damage increased by 10%

moves.name: Airburst
moves.description: Aang shoots a gust of air dealing 40 air damage. Affected enemies have a 40% chance of being stunned next turn.

moves.name: Energy Bending
moves.description: If target has less than 100 HP, they will be unable to use elemental attacks for 1 turn

moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang deals 25 fire, air, water and earth damage

moves.name: Water Goddess
moves.description: Water and Ice damage aimed at Aqua is converted into health instead

moves.name: God Blow
moves.description: Aqua deals 30 water damage

moves.name: Blessing
moves.description: Aqua heals a character for 75 HP

moves.name: Resurrection
moves.description: Aqua can bring back a character that died this turn with 25% HP

moves.name: Vibranium Protection
moves.description: If an energy attack below 40 damage targets the Captain or any ally adjacent to him, there is a 50% chance for the damage to be reflected back

moves.name: Shield Bash
moves.description: The Captain slams his shield and does 20 physical damage.

moves.name: Ricochet
moves.description: The Captain skillfully throws his shield at an enemy and bounces it off them to hit a second enemy, dealing 15 physical damage each time.

moves.name: Avengers Assemble
moves.description: Allies receive a signature charge equal to 50% of their requirement. All debuffs on any party members are erased.

moves.name: Witcher Mutation
moves.description: Any buffs applied to Geralt are doubled, and any debuffs are halved.

moves.name: Silver Sword Slash
moves.description: Geralt attacks with his greatsword for 25 physical damage.

moves.name: Flaming Sword Moulinet
moves.description: Geralt infuses his sword with fire and attacks for 45 fire damage. He has a 60% chance to deal 20 damage on the next turn.

moves.name: All Out
moves.description: Geralt drinks a cocktail of dangerous potions and attacks. He has a 20% chance of taking 30 damage, and an 80% chance to deal 80 damage to an opponent, as well as gain a 50% damage buff for the next turn (not affected by passive)

moves.name: Sayian genetics
moves.description: Goku gains a 25% damage bonus for every 70 HP he regains. This effect can occur 3 times

moves.name: Kamehameha
moves.description: Goku fires a blast dealing 50 energy damage

moves.name: Solar Flare
moves.description: Goku deals 18 energy damage to all enemies, and lowers their accuracy by 20%

moves.name: Super Dragon Fist
moves.description: Goku creates a dragon of pure energy, punching through it to deal 160 energy damage

moves.name: Illusionist
moves.description: Attacks aimed at Jack have a 20% increased chance to miss

moves.name: Blaster Rifle
moves.description: Jack shoots his rifle, dealing 20 energy damage.

moves.name: Matador
moves.description: Jack verbally abuses an enemy. The enemy takes 20% extra damage next turn.

moves.name: Psychological Warfare
moves.description: All allies gain a 30% damage bonus and 10 shield points

moves.name: OP Grinder
moves.description: Kirito Farms experience. Every turn he is not attacked, he gains 20% attack damage.

moves.name: Starburst Stream
moves.description: Kirito becomes a dual wielding beyblade and deals 40 physical damage.

moves.name: Full Swing
moves.description: Kirito attacks with Excalibur, dealing 140 energy damage. Can only be used after summoning Excalibur.

moves.name: Admin Privileges
moves.description: Kirito Summons Excalibur, which lasts for 2 turns

moves.name: God of War
moves.description: Kratos boosts the power of his allies signature by 50%

moves.name: Leviathan Axe
moves.description: Kratos attacks with his axe and deals 35 Ice damage.

moves.name: Chains of Hell
moves.description: Kratos swings his chains at an enemy, dealing 35 Fire Damage for two turns.

moves.name: Spartan Rage
moves.description: Kratos becomes enraged for the next two turns. All damage he deals is increased by 70%, and he uses his Leviathan axe.

moves.name: Multiplying Rage
moves.description: At the end of each round, Maul gains 15% damage bonus but takes 10% more damage.

moves.name: Saber Slice
moves.description: Maul slices with his lightsaber, dealing 40 energy damage.

moves.name: Force Choke
moves.description: Maul chokes an opponent, dealing 35 Air damage. If the opponent has less than 120 HP, they will do 30% reduced damage on their next attack.

moves.name: Power of the Dark
moves.description: Maul rips at the very foundations of the battleground, and hurls large rocks at his enemies. Deals 55 earth damage at two enemies

moves.name: Sky Goddess
moves.description: Nut is immune to air damage, and has a 40% chance to dodge attacks from characters

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: Nut shoots a cyclone dealing 30 Air damage at two enemies

moves.name: Dust Storm
moves.description: Nut creates a dust storm. Deals 20 air damage and reduces target's accuracy by 50% this turn

moves.name: World Wind
moves.description: Nut creates a powerful windstorm that deals 60 air damage to all enemies

moves.name: Cybertron's Leader
moves.description: Party members under 100 HP deal 50% additional damage

moves.name: Ion Blaster
moves.description: Optimus shoots a blast at an enemy, dealing 35 energy damage.

moves.name: Thermal Machine Gun
moves.description: Optimus shoots all enemies with a machine gun, dealing 20 energy damage per enemy.

moves.name: Sword of Judgement
moves.description: Optimus deals 60 energy damage and 15 energy damage to an enemy for the next two turns.

moves.name: Targeting System
moves.description: Increases allies base accuracy by 20%

moves.name: Zapper
moves.description: Deals 10 lightning damage

moves.name: Confusion Tactics
moves.description: Lowers an enemy's accuracy by 15%, deals 15 physical damage

moves.name: System Hack
moves.description: R2 finds the opponents weak spots. All enemies take 50% increased damage next turn

moves.name: Sacrifice
moves.description: When an ally dies, Ra's damage is increased by 50%

moves.name: Claw
moves.description: Ra strikes dealing 20 physical damage

moves.name: Sun Strike
moves.description: Ra unleashes an energy wave, dealing 30 energy damage

moves.name: Sun Dragon
moves.description: Ra deals energy damage equal to 150% of the damage he has received

moves.name: Electric Empress
moves.description: Each time the Shogun is attacked by a move that deals lightning or energy damage, her damage is increased by 30%

moves.name: Katana Strike
moves.description: The Shogun attacks with her lightning katana, dealing 40 lightning damage

moves.name: Burst Charge
moves.description: Raiden deals 35 Lightning damage to an opponent. For every subsequent signature attack used by any person on this turn, Raiden deals an additional 20 lightning damage

moves.name: Musou no Hitotachi
moves.description: The Shogun slices the fabric of reality with her blade, dealing 140 lightning damage at an enemy

moves.name: Apex Predator
moves.description: Trex deals 50% increased damage to opponents below 100 hp

moves.name: CHOMP
moves.description: Trex bites dealing 40 physical damage

moves.name: ROAR
moves.description: All enemies below 50hp are terrified for 1 turn. Enemies under the terrified condition do not attack and take 30% extra damage.

moves.name: Tyrant Lizard King
moves.description: Trex bites dealing 50 physical damage. The target takes 20 poison damage for the next 2 turns

moves.name: Tamaranean Durability
moves.description: Starfire has a 50% chance to ignore physical attacks under 30 damage.

moves.name: Heat Vision
moves.description: Starfire shoots lasers out her eyes and deals 40 Energy Damage.

moves.name: Seducer's Tongue
moves.description: Starfire targets an enemy. She has a 60% chance to apply the seduced effect for 1 turn. Enemies that are seduced will deal 0 damage.

moves.name: Starburst Explosion
moves.description: Starfire launches a giant explosion, dealing 50 AoE energy damage.

moves.name: Aretuza's Patronage
moves.description: Yennefer removes a debuff on an ally once per round

moves.name: Protection Magic
moves.description: Yennefer casts a shield on an ally. The shield can absorb 15 elemental and energy damage and lasts two turns. Cannot be stacked.

moves.name: Witch's Blessing
moves.description: Yen boosts an ally's elemental or energy attack by 35%

moves.name: Flaming Devastation
moves.description: Yen consumes 60% of her current HP and deals 70 fire damage and an additional 20 fire damage for 2 turns

moves.name: Defensive Rock
moves.description: All allies take 20% less damage

moves.name: Spear Strike
moves.description: Zhongli heavy attacks dealing 30 physical damage

moves.name: Meteor Strike
moves.description: Zhongli fires a rock at all opponents. Each hit does 15 earth damage.

moves.name: Mighty Shield
moves.description: Zhongli casts a shield on a party member. This shield has 50 shield points.
